entry.title: Trading Partner within MM Subcontracting Consumption posting
entry.content:
Hello,

we face an issue in MM Subcontracting with an intercompany vendor. We use MM Subcontracting for a type of repair service. We send the broken item with a delivery related to a subcontracting purchase order, the item in the order is the same material number. When we receive the item back, the GR Posting also posts the consumption of the item sent (special stock in sending company) with trading partner. But this item is never owned by the IC vendor. Because of the system behaviour we get in trouble with our consolidation team, since this entry can not be consolidated with the IC vendor, so its a one side trading partner entry.

The propsal of SAP support is an implicit enhancement which we would like to avoid.

Has anybody a standard solution for this topic or maybe a process which does not cause such an issue?

Many thanks in advance!

Regards, Marion

entry.title: SAPFPAYM not triggered automatically after F110 / Manage Automatic Payments
entry.content:
Hello SAP Experts,

I am facing an issue with Payment Medium Workbench (PMW) in S/4HANA.
When I run F110 (or Manage Automatic Payments), the payment run finishes successfully, payments are posted, and the payment advice notes are generated.

However, the payment medium file (DME) is not automatically created.
I always need to go to SE38 and run SAPFPAYM manually to generate the payment medium file.

In Manage Payment Media, the status of my items is usually "Downloaded", and I cannot change it to "To Be Generated".

Here are additional details:

  • Payment method is correctly assigned to DMEE format (e.g., FI_PAYMEDIUM_DMEE_CGI_05)

  • Program RFFOAVIS_FPAYM is assigned in the "Printout/Data Medium" tab of the payment method

  • In DME Administration (DMEEADMIN), I can see my file with "Data transmitted to external" checked

  • No DME file is found in AL11 unless I manually run SAPFPAYM

My question:

  • How can I configure F110 so that SAPFPAYM is automatically triggered during the payment run, without having to execute it manually?

  • Do I need to adjust the Payment Medium Workbench (PMW) selection variant, or maintain a missing link in the payment method customizing?

  • Could the status "Downloaded" in Manage Payment Media block the automatic generation?

Any advice or guidance on customizing steps to make SAPFPAYM run automatically after F110 would be greatly appreciated!

entry.title: RV Documents not picked in F110
entry.content:
Hello Gurus

I  need your assistance on the issue that we are getting. F110 payment proposal not considering the RV documents but the DR documents are getting picked. 

I have maintained all the settings in master data like Customer number in Vendor vise versa. clear with customer clearing, also maintained payment method at both level Customer and Vendor. 

During the proposal DR documents are getting picked but not RV, Is there a separate customization or any settings to allow the RV invoices.

entry.title: SAP gives error message "No automated rule is activated in the system."
entry.content:
Spoiler
 

Hi experts! 

I'm trying to use this (for us) new application "Manage processing Rules -For Bank statements" and have created manually and automated rules. The automated rule has been activated and has status "Active" in the application. But when I'm in the application "Reprocess bank statement items" and trying to apply the automated rule SAP gives us the error "Items could not be processed. No automated rule is activated in the system." The automated rules are not being applied when uploading a bank statement, even when the correct conditions are met.

The manual rule is working without any problems. 

System:

Product Version
SAP S/4HANA 2023
SAP S/4HANA FOUNDATION 2023
SAP FIORI FES 2023 FOR S/4HANA
SAP FIORI FOR SAP S/4HANA 2023
ABAP PLATFORM 2023

OKKN

entry.title: Deleting an Unused Chart of Accounts in SAP S/4HANA – Blocked by Special Purpose Ledger Usage
entry.content:
Dear SAP Experts,

I intend to delete an unused chart of accounts from our SAP S/4HANA system. When attempting to do so via transaction OB8Y or through the following path in the IMG:

SAP Customizing Implementation Guide → Financial Accounting → General Ledger Accounting → Preparation for Productive Start → New Installation → Delete Test Data → Delete Master Data → Delete Chart of Accounts

I receive the following error message:

"Chart of accounts is used in Special Purpose Ledger. Entries cannot be deleted."

After careful review, I can confirm that this chart of accounts is not in operational use.

My question to the community is:
How can I remove the associated entries in the Special Purpose Ledger (FI-SL) to allow for the complete deletion of the chart of accounts?

I would greatly appreciate any guidance or shared experiences regarding this matter.

Kind regards,

entry.title: Recording Additional Costs on a Purchase Order in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
entry.content:
Hello,

I need to create an invoice with additional costs. I have a Purchase Order (PO) with Supplier A, who has already submitted their invoice. Then, I need to create another invoice to Supplier B associated with the same purchase order, covering additional costs such as freight or customs.

Could you please advise on the options available in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition, to record these additional costs and properly associate the invoices with the original purchase order?

Thank you very much for your guidance.

entry.title: Automatic and Manual Payment Errors in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
entry.content:
Hello,

I am trying to set up automatic payments in the system, but I keep receiving errors regarding the IBAN for the bank data. However, that bank detail is not mandatory in Venezuela, so it does not exist. Nevertheless, I have entered the information in the bank master data, and the same error persists.

Additionally, I get errors indicating that the vendor does not have adequate bank details for payment method T, which is not true. The vendor has all the required information to receive payments via these methods. I followed the steps outlined in KBA 3444334, but the error still appears.

Do you have any idea what might be missing or wrong in my S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition system? Your guidance would be appreciated.

Thank you.

entry.title: Is it possible to separate the calculation of interest rates by customizing?
entry.content:
Question

Is it possible to separate the calculation of interest rates by customizing?

The invoice and accounting require the amounts of each interest rate to be displayed separately.

 

Analysis 

 At the customer XXXXX, it is required that the FINT transaction calculates and settles the interest and the surcharge separately. At this moment, in the test, the settlement of interest and the surcharge is totaled for the calculation, and thus it is carried to the generated accounting document.  

The client requires that the amount of interest (in this case 18%) be shown separately from the surcharge (in this case 2%) in the accounting records.

entry.title: Delete Imported Fixed Assets Master Data
entry.content:
I am using SAPB1 v10
I had import a range of Fixed Assets Master Data during new fiscal year start and no any depreciation running. One of the user accidentally select one of Fixed Assets Master Data used in a Purchase Order and GRN. Then user cancel both GRN and PO. Now this Fixed Assets Master Data not going to be use anymore and mgmt want to delete or inactive it.
However, I cannot delete it due to document applied and I also cannot retirement it because this items is wrong imported (FA item code is wrong key in).
How can I delete or inactive it?

entry.title: FB60 Duplicate invoices are not checked anymore
entry.content:
Hello experts,

In my system S4, FB60 Duplicate invoices are not checked anymore. before the check was working fine.

Now I checked, if the fields relevants for this check have been updated or changer, but it seems that there no way to change them, it's the standard behavior of SAP :

If the Reference Document Number field (BKPF-XBLNR) is filled up the following fields will be checked to idnetify duplicate invoices:

  • Company Code(BUKRS)
  • Vendor(LIFNR)
  • Currency(WAERS)
  • Invoice/Document Date(BLDAT)
  • Reference document number(XBLNR)

If the Reference Document Number field (BKPF-XBLNR) is not filled up the following fields will be checked to idnetify duplicate invoices:

  • Company Code(BUKRS)
  • Vendor(LIFNR)
  • Currency(WAERS)
  • Invoice/Document Date(BLDAT)
  • Amount in document currency(WRBTR)

Can you please confirm this ?

Now, what other points can I check ?

May be make a debug with a developer to make to check if there is a specific ABAP that bypass this check ?

 

Thank you for your help

Regards,

entry.title: subcontracting with rm sold and invoiced
entry.content:
Hi,

I have a case where our company produces flour. We are sub-contracting pasta making to a supplier where he will be using our flour but due to regulation, we have to issue an invoice for the quantity of flour to be used for pasta production.

in SAP, the subcontracting PO process consider transferring the flour to the supplier without issuing any invoice (flour will still be  owned by our company). 

Also, this same supplier is also a customer that is buying flour for his own consumption.

My questions are:

1- how to process a subcontracting PO where part of the BoM (flour) is sold and invoiced? is it possible?

2- in order to differentiate the customer from supplier, we consider creating another BP number for the same customer name but defined as customer and supplier in order to track the sold flour and the purchased finished good (pasta). Does this make sense?

3- From accounting perspective, how should I treat the transactions (POs and invoices, payments...), shoudl I create different GL accounts for the different BP numbers?

Appreciate your help on this
